name: Couplix
description:
Couplix is a challenging puzzle game that involves moving balls around from a spawn point to a goal with some obstacles in-between. The twist is that as the game gets more difficult you control multiple balls that move together. Do you have what it takes?

Use a keyboard to navigate and play the game.

Please note that currently the game is still in early access, and that game elements are subject to change.

Also available on Google Play

Feel free to post any feedback or criticism in the "first impressions" thread :)

Follow us on Twitter
